definition: to point towards/aimed at/facing/the direction indicated
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
surname Xiang

sentences.english: Dry tuck-pointing blades are used on hand-held circular saws and small, right angle grinders.
sentences.chinese: 干校内指向刀片用于手持圆锯和小磨直角。

sentences.english: He points over to the guard room as a carpet installation truck pulls up.
sentences.chinese: 他指向警卫室，一辆地毯铺装公司的货车开到了。

sentences.english: The brake lever axle hole should be pointing towards the top of the kingpin.
sentences.chinese: 制动杆的轴孔应指向对主销的顶部。

sentences.english: What starts as criticism of the foreign can quickly swing to domestic targets.
sentences.chinese: 对于外国的批判可以很快摇身一变指向内部的目标。

sentences.english: Finally, MaXiao point to my pistol suddenly flip, pointing blade.
sentences.chinese: 终于，马啸指向本人的手枪忽然翻转，指向刀锋。

sentences.english: Finally, MaXiao point to my pistol suddenly flip, pointing blade.
sentences.chinese: 终于，马啸指向本人的手枪忽然翻转，指向刀锋。

sentences.english: Menon however refrained from blaming Pakistan for the blasts.
sentences.chinese: 梅农对爆炸的指责有所控制，没有直接指向巴基斯坦。

sentences.english: Elephant trunk-like dust pillars point towards the hot blue stars and are tell-tale signs of their eroding effect.
sentences.chinese: 指向蓝色热星的象鼻状尘埃柱是辐射侵蚀效果的证据。

sentences.english: Around the sword light quickly gathered, the sword is pointing at me.
sentences.chinese: 四周的剑光又迅速聚来，刀剑皆指向我。

sentences.english: Reviews of experience point to potential benefits and practical difficulties of such systems.
sentences.chinese: 回顾指向潜在利益与在这样的系统中实际困难的经验。

sentences.english: You can point to an icon, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 例如，您可以指向一个图标。

sentences.english: This is shown in the closeup photo by the arrow pointing to one of the stamps.
sentences.chinese: 其中一张的箭头指向处，有放大图片可参考。

sentences.english: Then they discovered that the directivity of the magnet.
sentences.chinese: 后来又发现了磁石的指向性。

sentences.english: Release the Foot Switch when the Calibration Indicator reaches its set position.
sentences.chinese: 当刻度指示器指向规定的位置，放开脚踏板。

sentences.english: It refers to special astronomic events that will happen in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 它指向将在2012年发生的一次特殊天文事件。

sentences.english: The bottom part of each separation container unit is provided with water outlet passage pointed back and downward.
sentences.chinese: 各分离容器单元的底部均有指向后下方的出水通道。
